NewsArticle.Title: Plamit Cave Hunting Area (Beta Release)
NewsArticle.Content:
Plamit Cave Hunting Area will be released September 12th for Beta Testing. Players can hunt and gain EXP/AB during Beta testing. All EXP/AB legitimately earned through Beta testing are yours to keep.
Thank you for taking part in this rare Beta testing. Quests and new NPC options will be released in the following weeks.
Error and the Dark Ages Team
